rows.label: qev025602_MSG0005
rows.name:
Oh, come on! First my poor Aphrodite gets damaged,
then I get accosted by some weird Ma-non?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0006
rows.name:
I must have really pissed somebody off to get a day
like this...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0007
rows.name:
...Hmunh? What do you want? Please tell me you're
not here to make this day any worse.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev025602_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Christopher why he's angry.

rows.label: qev025602_JNK0020
rows.name: Soothe

rows.label: qev025602_SEL0021
rows.name: Encourage Christopher to chill out.

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0008
rows.name: Well, you SEEM reasonable, at least...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0009
rows.name:
So I was riding Aphrodite—that's my Skell—and
mowing down indigens with style.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0010
rows.name:
But then this rowdy potamus comes smashing into me
from out of nowhere and totally trashed poor
Aphrodite's front plating![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0011
rows.name:
Gah! It makes me mad to even think about it!
That Skell is the epitome of everything I find beautiful,
and having her marred by some indigen is just...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0012
rows.name:
CHILL? How am I supposed to CHILL?!
My beautiful Skell Aphrodite has been sullied![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0013
rows.name: Gah! It makes me mad to even think about it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0014
rows.name:
That Skell is the epitome of everything I find beautiful,
and I can't stand the thought of her being marred by
something as ugly as a rowdy potamus.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0015
rows.name: Aaaaaaarrrrgh! I'M SO MAD![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0042
rows.name:
If I could get revenge on that rowdy potamus at Sickle
Rock Rise, that might help to calm me down...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0016
rows.name:
But I can't because my Skell is wrecked! Oh, goddess
of beauty, why can you not smite the hideous beast
that defiled you?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0017
rows.name:
Aaaah! Just thinking about that filthy rowdy potamus
sauntering around Sickle Rock Rise is enough to make
my hair stand on end![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0018
rows.name:
...Or it would be, if I hadn't had all the body hair
permanently removed from this mimeosome.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0019
rows.name:
Damn that rowdy potamus! If Aphrodite were in fighting
shape, I'd be out there enacting some serious revenge
instead of standing here like a chump.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0020
rows.name:
Rrrrrrrgh! I'm so mad! I feel like I'm going crazy!
What am I supposed to do, huh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_JNK0030
rows.name: Inform

rows.label: qev025602_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Christopher that you killed the rowdy potamus.

rows.label: qev025602_JNK0040
rows.name: Mock

rows.label: qev025602_SEL0041
rows.name: Tease Christopher for your own amusement.

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0021
rows.name: ...Come again? You killed it for me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0022
rows.name: Oh man, you must be a BLADE like me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0023
rows.name:
Gnah? Wh-what the hell, [ST:gender p1=bro p2=lady ]?
Are you TRYING to get me to snap?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0024
rows.name:
RRRAGH! Everybody who stands in the way of my
aesthetics should just DIE![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0025
rows.name:
Oh oh oh my! His anger numbers have redlined my
Emotion-O-Meter, yes? [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0026
rows.name:
While these readings are extremely useful, I would ask
you to calm him down before he or my machine
breaks, okay? No breaking, please.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0027
rows.name:
You're a marvel. An angel. ...To the point where I find
it hard to believe this Ma-non brought you here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0028
rows.name:
Pheeew... All right. As long as that monster got its due,
I can rest easy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0029
rows.name:
Now I just have to make my beloved Aphrodite more
beautiful than ever.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0030
rows.name:
Mmm. You've managed to stabilize the subject's state,
haven't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0031
rows.name:
So, this is "anger," is it? Hmm. It seems you humans
still have a feral, animalistic aspect to you, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0032
rows.name:
But this has yielded superb data regardless!
Now then, I have a lead on on on the next test
subject if you'd care to follow me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0033
rows.name:
I have the strangest feeling that weird Ma-non called
me an animal...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0034
rows.name:
Eh, it must have been a mistake. No one with this
flawless skin-care regimen could be an animal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev025602_MSG0035
rows.name:
Aphrodite's repairs are coming along nicely. We'll be
back in the field fighting uglies in the name of beauty
in no time.[ST:wait ]
